product.title: BKBP Fully automatic curling iron 2-in-1 hair dryer brush automatic rotating roller hot air styler
product.description:
2 In 1 Hair Dryer Brush Automatic Rotating Roller Hot Air Styler
Features:
Hair Styler
With a powerful combination of a round brush and a hair dryer tool this can effectively dry and style your hair at once giving you a and frizz- shine in one single step.
Multifunctional Hair Styling Brush
Straighten dry curl style smooth and a dramatic volume and shine to your hair and get long lasting curls without hair products. The oval shaped brush keeps hair from getting and the round edges help volume to hair.
Ergonomic Design
Natural softbristles for ultimate smoothness to frizz and damage.
ceramic coating technologies to give regulated temperature and your hair and scalp from hurting.
Ergonomic handle is designed for maximum comfort and ease of use during styling.
360° swivel cord allows high flexibility to move freely without the cord or damaged.
Salon-Perfect-Blow-Dry at Home
No need for a trip to the salon anymore savesyou a lot of time and . This can be used for party work and travel suitable for men women and whole family. Become a fashionista anytime anywhere.
Product Description:
Product name: Automatic curling comb
Product size: 318x53x53mm
Color box size: 33.5x9.5x6cm
Material: PC+
Bare metal weight: 385g
Single set weight: 632g
Packing size: 49.5*35*35cm
Packing weight: 13.2kg Packing number: 20pcs
Voltage: AC 100-240V Power: 40W
Current: 0.35A Speed: 40
Gear position: three gears (180℃ 200℃ 230℃)
Function: three-speed temperature control + left and right rotation + alarm prompt
Certification: 3C ROHS
Color: pink black red
Heating method:
Memory function: Stop in that gear when shutting down and to the gear when shutting down when restarting.
Heating time: 180°C for about 110 seconds. About 220 seconds at 200°C. 230°C for about 350 seconds

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
